title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
quote: I’ve been drunk for about a week now, and I thought it might sober me up to sit in a library.

author: George Orwell
quote: Who controls the past controls the future. Who controls the present controls the past.

title: The Starless Sea
author: Erin Morgenstern
quote: Occasionally, Fate pulls itself together again and Time is always waiting.

title: The Outsider: A Novel
author: Stephen King
quote: If you can’t let go of the past, the mistakes you’ve made will eat you alive.
